title: A developer who comes from the world of sales
photoAlt: Profile picture of Johan, web developer
photoCaption: Johan – former wine merchant, now web developer.
lead: Before building websites, I spent several years working in wine: first in a wine shop, dealing directly with retail customers (B2C), then at a fine wine merchant, working with demanding professionals (B2B).
text1: I learned how to listen, quickly understand a business, explain technical things in simple terms and build long-term relationships. Today, I use these skills to turn your activity into a clear, reassuring and credible website for your clients.
text2: I then trained as a web developer (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Node) with a simple goal: to offer small businesses modern, fast and easy-to-understand websites, without technical jargon.

item1.text: visibility, a serious image, easy contact and saving time.

item2.text: wine trade, retail, craftsmanship, small businesses – not jargon.

item3.strong: I work in a simple way:
item3.text: to craft, step by step, a clean website that reflects who you are and reassures your clients.

outro: Whether you are a wine shop, a wine merchant, a craftsman or a small business, my goal is that you recognise yourself in your website – and that your clients feel like contacting you or coming to see you.
